title: 751 5 "Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!"Transliteration: "Bōken Kaimaku - Maboroshi no Shima "Zō" Tōchaku!" (Japanese:冒険開幕 幻の島｢ゾウ｣到着！) Katsumi Tokoro Tomohiro Nakayama July 31, 2016(2016-07-31) November 9, 2025
transformers_text: 751 5 Curtain up on a New Adventure Arriving at the Phantom Island Zo u Transliteration B ken Kai mak u Ma boro shi no Shima Z T c haku Japanese Katsumi To koro Tomohiro Nakayama July 31 2016 2016 07 31 November 9 2025 Bartolomeo tells his crew how the Straw Hats first came to be Meanwhile at Marine Headquarters Admiral Ki zar u gets a report about the new Warlord Edward Weevil defeating sixteen of White beard's allies while destroying cities Many people doubt his claim of being White beard's biological son but Ki zar u states his strength is similar to the former Emperor in his prime After being caught in thick fog everyone on the Bar to Club's ship spot a huge shadow moving to which their surprise is a massive elephant Law reveals that Zo u is on the elephant's back where it's populated by the Mink Tribe for 1000 years
